snippet: A new index measures which colleges have the most economically diverse student bodies — and charge the least to lower-income students.
abstract: David Leonhardt The Upshot; new College Access Index measures which top colleges have the most economically diverse student bodies and charge the least to lower-income students.
lead_paragraph: A new index measures which colleges have the most economically diverse student bodies — and charge the least to lower-income students.

headline.main: Top Colleges That Enroll Rich, Middle Class and Poor
headline.print_headline: Measuring Colleges’ Success in Enrolling the Less Affluent
